extension.description: This script plays random items from various types of lists. Works on TV Shows/Seasons/Episode smart playlists, should work on Movie Sets/Genres/Music, other playlists. Search/Filter from the left hand side seems unlikely/precarious.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on does not add functionality is used by skins or other add-ons, such as the 'Play Random Items menu item' add-on.
